newsitem.title: FINLAND: PARTEK SAYS AKER'S GJELSTEN TO JOIN BOARD.
newsitem.headline: PARTEK SAYS AKER'S GJELSTEN TO JOIN BOARD.

text.p: Finnish building materials group Partek Oy Ab said on Monday it proposed to an extraordinary shareholders meeting on November 25 the appointment of Aker's new CEO Bjorn-Rune Gjelsten to its board.
Board member Tom Ruud had given notice of his resignation due to his appointment as CEO of Norway's second largest bank Kreditkassen , it said in a statement.
"Aker ASA has announced that they will appoint Mr Bjorn-Rune Gjelsten, Aker's new CEO, to Partek's board of directors," Partek said.
